overview.en: Short for Krypton, KR is the token of BlockWorld, a Blockchain game. It is based on ERC-20 Token Standard and has a total supply of 1 billion tokens, with no future issuance. Based on Blockchain, BlockWorld is a new virtual world which uses 2D/8Bit pixel map as the basic form, and each block in this world will be recorded on blockchain. You can create content on your purchased block, issue your crypto assets and get rich minerals under the blocks.
overview.zh: KR（氪）是Krypton的简称，是区块链游戏BlockWorld内各游戏场景使用的通证。KR基于ERC20发行，总量10亿枚，永不增发。BlockWorld是一个基于区块链技术打造的全新概念的虚拟世界。游戏以23/8Bit像素地图作为载体，每一个区块土地都会上链记录。玩家可以通过购买土地，进行内容创作，发行个人数字资产并挖取土地下蕴藏的丰富矿铲，在游戏娱乐的同时获取丰厚的收益。
